column5: Fished a different part of the creek today. Missed a real nice brown.This creek has so much beautiful water.      Managed this chubb.    Now to my question,,,,,,,,,,,,  They had a beautiful green body and black wings. It looks like they are mating.
I am not sure what the fly is but that is a great picture.
I don't know but I think it's fly porn...LOL  great photo
Wow that river has dropped since the last time I fished it..   :eek:

It wasn,t to bad Bill. Oh and thanks for the tip bud. I was wondering if I was going to find the water.Good long walk though.I was very surprised,I didnt see any wild life. Im thinking I,m done  for now on that piece of water.The growth is to much to thrash through,and the water is getting warmer. I,m going to start playing in the big river for a bit. Pike and maybe  there are some steel in the fast waters.  When bass opens,they will be my next target.
NP man, I like fishing that place before the vegetation takes over, lol!   Water is getting a bit warm anyhow..
There was quite a hatch of Damsel flies today on the Ottawa river.
cool pics man ... I enjoy your river pics ... and next time give them some privacy  they are gonna be dinner sooner anyways ....  So you enjoying the fly rod?
